name: Monster Hunter: "Worldle"
description:
Monster Hunter: Worldle is a Monster Hunter-themed take on the Wordle game, inspired by Loldle! Take a shot at guessing what Monster has been selected, gaining clues as you go along until you figure it out!

Monster Hunter: Worldle is planned to eventually include every monster from the mainline games, spin-offs and Frontier seasons. For now, Monsters introduced in the following games are included:

  • Monster Hunter
  • Monster Hunter G
  • Monster Hunter 2 / Dos
  • Monster Hunter Freedom
  • Monster Hunter Freedom 2
  • Monster Hunter Freedom Unite
  • Monster Hunter 3 / Tri
  • Monster Hunter 3 Ultimate
  • Monster Hunter 4
  • Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate

DISCLAIMER: I do not own anything related to the Monster Hunter series and am not affiliated with Capcom! All rights reserved to their rightful owners :)
